flawed_nl_solution:
The school bought 10 x 20 = <<10*20=2000>>2000 bottled water.
There were 2000 - 70 = <<2000-70=1930>>1930 bottled water left after the first game.
So, there were 1930 - 20 = <<1930-20=1910>>1910 bottled water used during the second game.
#### 1910

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 2000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
